Description: This auction is for a Reville Q90 left handed guitar. If you like to tinker with guitars or want Frankenstein project, this is a good guitar to play with. P90's sound great. If you dive bomb on the tremolo it will definitely knock it out of tune. More importantly 50% of the profit of this auction will go to benefit Todd Youth's ( Warzone, Murphy’s Law, D Generation, Danzig, Fireburn, etc) GoFundMe set top by his children. According to the site: "Beyond raising funds to cover the costs incurred with this unexpected loss and fulfilling his spiritual wishes we are raising money so we are able to continue the financial support our father provided our younger sister, Isabella, who requires high monthly health insurance payments. We also hope to raise money to set aside funds for college and grad school for all 3 of his daughters." If you have any questions please let me know.
Title: Reville Q90 Left handed Powder Blue guitar (50% to charity)
ConditionDescription: purchased about two months ago, no scuffs, dents, cracks etc.
